comment_text: Well I am one of the people who support one nation under God being in the Pledge of allegiance. Whether some people like it or not there is no denying that the founding of our country was majorly based on a belief in God and relying on Him for help and guidance. And the separation of Church and State is actually not in the Constitution but in a letter that Thomas Jefferson wrote to a church to reassure them that the GOVERNMENT couldn't make laws about the CHURCH not that the Church couldn't be involved in the Government. There is a difference.
argument_text: Under God  is part of American tradition and history
